entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support cookie values with comma #58773
  • Add a test for verifying non-modified reader state in JsonDocument.ParseValue on deep values #58772
  • System.Text.Json source generator fails to deserialize init-only properties #58770
  • [API Proposal]: Add `System.Reflection.Metadata.Ecma335.ControlFlowBuilder.Reset`. #58765
  • regex: different behavior between .NET Framework and .NET Core #58757
  • The actual `ExceptBy` and IntersectBy` APIs differ from the approved APIs #58756
  • DOTNET_ROLL_FORWARD=Major ignores in new builds of .net 6 since preview 7 #58754
    7.0.0
  • Support the Windows 11 I/O ring API #58752
  • [System.Net.Http.Json] System.Net.Http.Json - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58750
    6.0.0
  • createdump cannot write to stdout #58747
    7.0.0
  • When I run the diagnostic analysis tool, got some warning #58743
  • [ZlibStream] ArgumentOutOfRangeException when passing in compression levels past level 3 (cast from manual enum defining all of the native compression levels). #58742

Closed

  • HttpClient Silently Omits Message Body If Header Has Trailing Newline #58769
  • [QualityWeek] Check-Release diffs with x86 #58063
    7.0.0
  • Allow dump from createdump to be piped to another program (e.g. for compression) #9840
    Future
  • Using Covariant returns for RuntimeType crashes during crossgen #45356
    5.0.x
  • PerfScore inconcistencies with memory accesses #49647
    Future
  • Assertion failed '(gcInfo.gcRegGCrefSetCur & (RBM_CALLEE_TRASH & ~RBM_ARG_REGS)) == 0' #58539
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add `JitEnregStats` complus. #58776
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Throw on unsupported types in src gen #58775
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • Add explicit APIs to Double/Single/Half/TimeOnly #58774
    area-System.Numerics, blocking-release, 6.0.0
  • Decrease refcount of unreachable finally properly #58771
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Issue diagnostic warnings when context types don't indicate serializable types #58768
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Support duplicated type names with src gen #58766
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Change namespace of embedded Cecil in ILStrip task #58764
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Change namespace of embedded Cecil in ILStrip task #58763
    6.0.0
  • WIP: Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Always write sample events in EventPipe based on sample frequency. #58761
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Update branding for 5.0.11 #58760
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Treat ALWAYS of callf+always pair normally and fix live range coalescing #58749
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Try deleting -Werror in config scripts #58746
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • System.Net.Ping: Skip TimeoutIsRespected test if network is unreachable #58745
    area-System.Net
  • Make GCMemoryInfoData blittable #58738
    area-System.Memory

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Skip allocation for ZeroInit writeThru intervals #58767
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Clean up tests under src/tests/reflection #58673
    area-System.Reflection-coreclr
  • Switch weights to doubles to mitigate rounding inaccuracies and use epsilon when sorting locals #58630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix PerfScore inconcistencies #56812
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Skip allocation for ZeroInit writeThru intervals #58677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unused test libraries under classloader #58596
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Support duplicated type names with src gen #58448
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Avoid S.S.Permissions dependency in S.S.Crypto.Xml #58731
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Support JsonConverterFactory with src-gen #58652
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP/3] Stress disable offending op causing server errors #58541
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] add TLS 1.3 support to WinHttp #58718
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add support for variance to IDIC #58670
    area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Undo struct promotion on "RetInd" code path #58602
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mini] Don't add unbox tramopline on generic DIM calls #58585
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add support for variance to IDIC #58646
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Remove Reflection.Emit packages from the Windows Compatibility Pack on frameworks greater than .NET Standard 2.0. #56973
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Revert "Fix HAVE_PTHREAD_CONDATTR_SETCLOCK detection on Android" #58755
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] [mono] win32 implementation of g_get_current_dir #58555
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add threading test for Regex #58595
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • PosixSignalRegistrationTests.Unix: validate signal pal mapping #58711
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Remove conditional compilation conditions that are no longer possible #58377
    area-System.Security, community-contribution

Updated

  • More cleanups in Assembly/Loader/Binder area #58462
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #57556
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Support aot without trimming #58306
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Upgrade to net7.0 and remove target frameworks #58011
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix setting creation date for OSX & setting dates on symlinks on Unix #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [WASM] Node Debugger #56473
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [WIP] Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Optimize Vector128/256.Equals via TestZ #55875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Send RST_STREAM instead EOF when sending request body is cancelled #58548
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [release/5.0] Add support for variance to IDIC #58672
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 5.0.x
  • [DRAFT][wasm] WebSocket improve send buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • [mono] Revive FullAOT test lanes #55362
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [wasm] Enable AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #58578
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Add System.Net.Http ServerCertificateCustomValidationCallback ILLink Suppression #58508
    area-System.Net.Http, os-android, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] The signal enum in the native library should match the managed code. #58682
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • Expose nint/nuint overloads for BitOperations #58733
    area-System.Numerics
  • DO NOT MERGE: Macos builds on perf measure pool #58514
    * NO MERGE *
  • [wasm] WebSocket perf test #58730
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Make bashing to constants nicer #58171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Convert Interlocked intrinsics to NamedIntrinsics #55170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add IDisposable interface to GCHandle #55596
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Retarget DOTNETHOME when installing x64 on ARM64 #58669
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Fix Windows 8 detection. #58736
    area-System.Security
  • Add documentation to System.Net #57855
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add perfmap debug directory entry to crossgen2 output as needed #58552
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix source generation support for tuples with explicitly named elements #58723
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • Delete duplicate runtime tests #58676
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Enforce scatter/gather file I/O Windows API requirements et. al. #58423
    area-System.IO
  • [release/6.0] Fix detection of unsupported links #58399
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Make sure EventPipe streaming thread won't write session->streaming_thread after session free. #58710
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Better codegen for `(T)x | (T)y` #58727
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Increase some of the DnsEndPointTest timeouts #58617
    area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • Always write sample events in EventPipe based on sample frequency. #58720
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Optimize division by constant after AND or RSZ #55778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use AVX2 in codegen for GT_STORE_BLK #55604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • only cache credentials on success #58594
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Initialize compCurBB during fgInsertGCPoll #57334
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable global constant propagation for small types #57726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Disable test parallelization in installer tests #58604
    area-HostModel
  • Nullable annotation for System.Windows.Extensions #57896
    area-Microsoft.Win32, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add cast when replacing promoted struct with field in lowering #58589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Simplify .NETFramework tfms #58558
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Align preallocationSize behavior #58726
    area-System.IO
  • Improve SortedSet DeepCopy performance #56561
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix: Incorrect order of checks for TypeBuilder `GetConstructor` and `GetField` method #53645
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • First round of converting System.Data.OleDb to COMWrappers #54822
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • Refactor XmlWriter{Async} #58105
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Make sure IPGlobalProperties and NetworkInterface.GetIsNetworkAvailable methods return the correct info #57096
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Net, os-ios, 7.0.0
  • Implement SinPi, CosPi and TanPi and inverses #53675
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use CustomCommand to run runtime tests for mobile targets on helix #57292
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Abstractions` #57401
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Rev Alpine WithNode from 3.9 to 3.13 #57324
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Don't force using the system libunwind for source-build #58641
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add tizen armel build CI for pull request #56281
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update ELT profiler tests to include tests when a function returns HFA/HVA struct on Arm64 #54912
    arch-arm64, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
